name: Political Parties (Amendment) Act, 2004
tagline: Further amendment to the Political Parties Order, 2002
content:
1 POLITICAL PARTIES (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2004.  
ACT No. III OF 2004  
 An Act further to amend the Political Parties Order, 2002  
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Political Parties Order, 2002 (Chief 
Executive's Order No.18 of 2002), for the purpose here inafter appearing:  
1. Short title and commencement .- (1) This Act may be called the Political Parties 
(Amendment) Act, 2004.  
(2) It shall come into force at once and shall be deemed to have taken effect on and 
from the 31st December, 2003.  
2. Omission of A rticle 9, Chief Executive's Order No.18 of 2002. In the Political 
Parties Order, 2002 (Chief Executive's Order No. 18 of 2002), Article 9 shall be omitted.  
 
 
_____
